text:
@smalltroll1 @Uber Survival of the fittest has nothing to do with it. We all look out for ourselves and our kin. If there was evidence that there is a deadly virus out there, killing left and right, we wouldn't need the media to tell us. 
If it was dangerous, I'd be doing the right thing
